about_the_game:
Step into the spooky world of [Shadows Are Alive[/b] with this demo! Get a sneak peek of the survival horror experience before diving into the full adventure. In this limited version, you'll explore the first of the three maps featured in the full release—the haunted mansion—and face the looming threat of The Shift, a relentless entity hunting you at every turn.



In the demo, you’ll take control of a heroic firefighter, mastermind lockpicker, insightful psychologist, or resourceful inventor—each equipped with unique skills to help you survive the night. Use their abilities to navigate the mansion’s shifting walls and mysterious rooms while evading the dark entity, The Shift.



Every turn you take in the mansion unveils new challenges, every strategy you devise is put to the test. Keep your lantern close, it's your line of defense against The Shift's eerie "Shift Vision".



And remember, you've got a clock ticking down. 20 minutes, that's all you have. Either you master the mansion, or it masters you!

What can you expect in this cosy survival horror?

Evolving Playgrounds



Every single journey into the haunted mansion serves up fresh thrills, challenges, and pathways.

Aura or Nothing


Evade The Shift who's after your glow – the very aura that defines you in this shadow-filled world.

Vivid Imagery


A game world bursting with color and character—imagine if your favorite animated movie met the coolest survival game.

Shape-Shifting Pursuer


The Shift isn't just any foe; navigate its dual forms, both the tangible terror and its swift, smoke-like state.

Epic Team-Ups



Join forces, mix and match abilities, and strategize with friends in high-octane multiplayer sessions.

Hidden Depths


Behind each alter ego, lies a tale waiting to be uncovered. And The Shift? Its past is shrouded in mystery.



The full release of Shadows Are Alive will expand on this demo with more maps, heroes, escape routes, and even more terrifying Shifts. So, ready for a taste of the heart-racing, time-chasing, and mind-blowing adventure?

name: Shadows Are Alive Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660, 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX Vega 56, 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Enter the ever-changing world of Shadows Are Alive! Team up, channel epic alter-egos, and outwit "The Shift" in a shape-shifting haunted mansion. Relentless suspense, vibrant visuals, and unmatched strategy. Can you escape the mansion before time runs out?

English*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Serbian, French, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Malay
